maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_FRAMEBUFFER_WRAPPER_H
#define BEAST_FRAMEBUFFER_WRAPPER_H

#include <beastapi/beastframebuffer.h>
#include "beastwrappers/beastfundamentalswrapper.h"

#include <vector>

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastFramebuffer : public BeastObject<ILBFramebufferHandle> {
public:
        BeastFramebuffer(ILBFramebufferHandle h, bool persistent = false) : BeastObject<ILBFramebufferHandle>(h), m_persistent(persistent) {
        }

        virtual ~BeastFramebuffer();

        void setPersistent(bool persistent);
        void getChannelCount(int& channels);
        void getResolution(int& width, int& height);
        void readRegionHDR(int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY, ILBChannelSelection channels, std::vector<float>& target);
        void readRegionLDR( int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY, ILBChannelSelection channels, float gamma, std::vector<unsigned char>& target );
private:
        bool m_persistent;
};

}

#endif // BEAST_FRAMEBUFFER_WRAPPER_H
